name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm

reviews.text: First, the location is excellent, just blocks from shopping and only a block from the main train station. The hotel obviously has a high turnover of guests and is staffed to handle it.
reviews.title: excellent staff/location

reviews.text: Second, the staff not only have a high level of English but are also involved with their guests in a professional manner. Nayra at the front desk went far beyond duty to aid us in the recovery of our luggage which was lost by KLM.
reviews.title: A tired hotel - not up to the usual Radisson high standards

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the rooms to be par with Radisson standards and can voice no complaints there. The breakfast buffet was typically European and inclusive. The Fisk Restaurant off the lobby was not only excellent but fairly priced, at least for Stockholm. Would stay here again and recommend it.
reviews.title: Room with a view!

reviews.text: A bit disappointing by Radisson standards. It is however in a brilliant location a few yards from central station with the high speed link to the airport taking just twenty minutes.
reviews.title: Superb location

reviews.text: Room and in particular the bathroom was in need of a makeover. Breakfast was a very poor experience - no milk and no clean available cutlery - all met with complete indifference and a lack of apology from the waiting staff. All too busy clearing up to be bothered with the inconvenience of guests.
reviews.title: Excellent location - great breakfast buffet

reviews.text: The hotel is conveniently located, at 3 min distance from the Arlanda express, train and metro stations. The city center can also be reached rather quickly. The front desk staff preparation is excellent, they helped me printing the boarding pass and everyone spoke excellent english. I took a business room: it is not that large and there is little room for clothes, but it will work well for a short stay of 2-3 nights. The spa and fitness area is also well equipped, including whirlpool and sauna (no hamam though). Wifi is available for free everywhere. Breakfast buffet is excellent. I certainly can recommend this hotel for your stay in Stockholm.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel close to the station and airport connection

reviews.text: Booking in advance, had several rooms for family members. Staff was adequate. Prices OK. Simply can not beat the location. It is adjacent to arlanda bus, central train station, and Arlanda Xpress. Good breakfast with lots of choices, I should say scandinavian choices. If you stay, or even if not, go to the bar at top of the hotel (Sky Bar) for a great view and reasonable drinks with friendly locals. Worst part of stay was (lack of) wifi. It was promised, it was lacking. Only good reception was on ground floor, or at breakfast. In the room, not so much. Was told it was being worked on.
reviews.title: Good central location, good breakfast, WiFi meh...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a standard room with a queen bed, comfortable enough but squeezed into a small space so that one of us had almost no room to get out of the side of the bed and could exit only sliding down to the foot of the bed.
reviews.title: Cramped sleeping area and bathroom

reviews.text: The bathroom is quite small and there is nowhere to put your toiletries, the space around the ash basin is tiny. Shower is good but very cramped.
reviews.title: Convenient, good value

reviews.text: On the other hand there was an extensive area with sofa and chair and a desk/chair plus television (also one in the bedroom).
reviews.title: Good value for Stockholm and great location

reviews.text: We stayed in Radisson Blu Royal Viking hotel in Stockholm for 3 nights in late June as a couple with a child.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros: Superb location –side exit leads you straight to the subway maze with lots of shops, take-aways, restaurants, etc and of course to the city trains. It also takes you to the main train station and to the Arlanda Express stop from/to the airport. Bus stops are within walking distances as also the attractions such as City Hall, Canal cruise stops, Gamla Stan (old town), Royal Palace, etc. This aspect simply eclipses others you may want to use as a measure of assessment.
reviews.title: careful - there are 2 Radisson Blu's in Stockholm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was excellent. All people are friendly and speak good English. Ready to help and assist. Quick, prompt and courteous. Our washbasin stopper was jammed in the drain when we first checked in. Our complaint was immediately attended and the problem resolved. We requested directions, tips and maps- which were provided immediately with a smile.
reviews.title: Pricey, but it is Stockholm!

reviews.text: Food (Breakfast buffet) was simply enormous and outstanding. The quality was top class.
reviews.title: Old Fashioned

reviews.text: Room price was very competitive considering the location.
reviews.title: Ideal location

reviews.text: Excellent location in the middle of downtown convenient walking distance to stores and right next to T-Centralen, Pendeltåg commuter rail and Arlanda Express train to the airport.
reviews.title: Centrally located

reviews.text: Rooms were well-appointed and of moderate size. We had a "Family Suite" which had a living room with fold out couch attached to the bedroom with a queen bed.
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.text: The Blu Royal Viking is situated right beside central station and ideal for walking around the city. Ideal for airport transfer. The rooms are clean and as you would expect from a Radisson hotel. Cannot be beaten for location. Stockholm is very expensive generally so ensure you have lots of money. Venture to Slussen for more reasonable priced food and drinks.
reviews.title: Stockholm

reviews.text: Excellent staff, facilities and location. Ideally located just a short walk from the magnificent old city with all it's attractions.
reviews.title: Nice business hotel

reviews.text: If one intends to travel further afield it is close but not too close to Central Railway Station. The breakfast is the best ever, something for all tastes.
reviews.title: Great location, book direct

aka: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm Hotel Stockholm
description: Attractive Atrium Hotel located downtown, adjacent to Central train station, airport express trains, World Trade Center & Old Town.
